name: Zol Slime
description: A slime enemy that can appear in different states, including under a lifting rock.

fields.name: Zol Slime State
fields.description: Defines the state or situation of the Zol Slime.

0.name: Default
0.description: The Zol Slime is in its default state.

16.name: Under a 2-Person Lifting Rock
16.description: The Zol Slime is located under a rock that requires two people to lift.
